MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH15 postcode area of Edinburgh. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:57PM to safely carry out repair work on our electrical equipment on Niddrie Mill Avenue and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:05 PM on Sunday, 13 December 2020
